title: "DeepMind tortured ChatGPT to reveal sources"
excerpt: "We ask the questions A team of boffins from Google's DeepMind used a torture method on ChatGPT until it revealed the snippets of the data it was trained on. The boffins used a new type of attack prompt which asked a production model of the chatbot to repeat specific words forever."
